Metadata: This flyer, available on request, gives a brief description of 22 1/2" VHS seafood training video tapes that may be borrowed from the UC Sea Grant Extension Program covering seafood processing, retailing, and food service. Most are approximately 20 minutes in length; a tape on sanitation for seafood processing personnel is also available in Spanish. Tapes may be borrowed, one or two at a time, for one-week periods. For more information contact Dr. R. J. Price, Sea Grant Extension Program, Food Science and Technology Department, University of California, Davis, California 95616- 8598.
